Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Marge \Marge\, n. [F. marge. See {Margin}.] Border; margin; edge; verge. [Poetic] --Tennyson. [1913 Webster]
Along the river's stony marge. --Wordsworth. [1913 Webster]
marge n : a spread made chiefly from vegetable oils and used as a substitute for butter [syn: {margarine}, {margarin}, {oleo}, {oleomargarine}]
